io.spine.server.commandbus

Class CommandScheduler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.spine.server.commandbus.CommandScheduler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BusFilter<CommandEnvelope>, Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExecutorCommandScheduler

    public abstract class CommandScheduler
extends java.lang.Object
implements BusFilter<CommandEnvelope>, Closeable
    Schedules commands delivering them to the target according to the scheduling options.

    • Method Detail

      • filter

        public java.util.Optional<io.spine.core.Ack> filter(CommandEnvelope envelope)
        Description copied from interface: BusFilter
        Accepts or rejects a passed message.

        A filter can:

        • accept the message (by returning Optional.empty());
        • reject the message with Error status, for example, if it fails to pass the validation;
        • reject the message with OK status. For example, a scheduled command may not pass a filter;
        • reject the message with a business rejection. For example, a command can be rejected if the user who made the request does not have enough permissions in the system. Such rejection is only applicable to commands.
        Specified by:
        filter in interface BusFilter<CommandEnvelope>
        Parameters:
        envelope - the envelope with the message to filter
        Returns:
        Optional.empty() if the message passes the filter, posting result with either status otherwise

      • isOpen

        public boolean isOpen()
        Description copied from interface: Closeable
        Tells if the object is still open.

        Implementations must return false after AutoCloseable.close() is invoked.

        Specified by:
        isOpen in interface Closeable

      • close

        public void close()
        Description copied from interface: BusFilter

        By default, performs no action.

        Specified by:
        close in interface BusFilter<CommandEnvelope>
        Specified by:

      • schedule

        public void schedule(io.spine.core.Command command)
        Schedules a command and delivers it to the target according to the scheduling options.

        A command with the same ID cannot be scheduled again.

        Parameters:
        command - a command to deliver later
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the scheduler is shut down

      • commandBus

        protected CommandBus commandBus()
        Obtains CommandBus associated with this scheduler.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if CommandBus was not set prior to calling this method

      • doSchedule

        protected abstract void doSchedule(io.spine.core.Command command)
        Schedules a command and delivers it to the target according to the scheduling options set to a context.
        Parameters:
        command - a command to deliver later
        See Also:
        CommandScheduler.post(Command)

      • post

        protected void post(io.spine.core.Command command)
        Delivers a scheduled command to a target.
        Parameters:
        command - a command to deliver

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
        Initiates an orderly shutdown in which previously scheduled commands will be delivered later, but no new commands will be accepted.

        Invocation has no effect if the scheduler is already shut down.
